input.sentences: a group of bikes waiting to be ridden .
the bikers start off on their ride .
the cow statue wearing a face mask .
the rider is locking his bike up at night .
output.sentences: We've ridden bikes on tour before and our rented models were waiting for us.
All of us bikers on the tour decided to start the ride right after breakfast.
City traffic can be a real nightmare, so we were wise to go for an early start.
One of the odd things we passed, once out of the city, was a bovine statue, wearing a mask.
We rode until night and then after locking our bikes all of us, to the last rider went into our hotel to eat and sleep.
